abstract: School superintendents in Texas approve rule requiring public school officials to use birth certificate to determine student-athlete's gender; transgender activists criticize move.

headline.print_headline: Rule on Transgender Athletes Is Amended
headline.main: Rule on Transgender Athletes Amended in Texas

snippet: School superintendents in Texas overwhelmingly approved a change that requires public school officials to use a birth certificate to determine a student-athlete’s gender.
lead_paragraph: School superintendents in Texas overwhelmingly approved a change that requires public school officials to use a birth certificate to determine a student-athlete’s gender.
